name: Project Weakness
text: You curse the target with the weaknesses of your kind of vampirism. The creature reacts to garlic, mirrors, ringing bells, sunlight, and so on as if it were a vampire of the same type as you. This cannot kill the target; anything that would kill it (such as a lengthy exposure to sunlight if you are a moroi vampire) renders it helpless until the curse or the harmful effect is removed. The target gains none of the benefits of being a vampire (such as fast healing or requiring special ways to be permanently killed), only the penalties.
text_zh: 你诅咒受术者让它获得你族类吸血鬼一般会有的弱点。该生物与大蒜、镜子、钟声、阳光等等的东西互动时，如同它是一位与你同种类的吸血鬼般。这无法杀死受术者; 任何会导致死亡的(例如如果你是茉莉[moroi]血族吸血鬼，长时间暴露在阳光底下)会使该生物变成无助(helpless)状态，直到该诅咒或是有害的效果被移除为止。受术者不会获得该种类吸血鬼的好处(像是快速治疗或是需要特殊的方法才能永远的杀死)，只获得处罚。
